mapper.select: select ui.password , ci.commission_info_id , ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 , ci.commission_ratio , ui.phone_number , ci.total_earnings , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , ui.email , ui.username FROM commission_info ci left join user_info ui on ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ui.password , ci.commission_info_id , ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 , ci.commission_ratio , ui.phone_number , ci.total_earnings , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , ui.email , ui.username FROM commission_info ci left join user_info ui on ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ui.password , ci.commission_info_id , ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 , ci.commission_ratio , ui.phone_number , ci.total_earnings , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , ui.email , ui.username FROM commission_info ci left join user_info ui on ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 = ui.user_info_id where ci.commission_info_id = #{id}
